name: Gaming Laptop
description: 15.6-inch gaming laptop featuring NVIDIA RTX 3060 graphics, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and a 144Hz display. Perfect for modern gaming and content creation with advanced cooling system and RGB keyboard.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Programmable 12-cup coffee maker with built-in grinder, multiple brew strength settings, and keep-warm function. Features anti-drip system and reusable filter. Includes auto-shutoff for safety.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning technology, breathable mesh upper, and superior arch support. Designed for both long-distance running and daily training. Features reflective elements for night visibility.

name: Backpack
description: Water-resistant 30L backpack with padded laptop compartment, multiple organization pockets, and hidden anti-theft pocket. Ergonomic design with adjustable shoulder straps and breathable back panel.

name: Smartphone
description: Latest generation smartphone with 6.7-inch OLED display, 5G capability, triple camera system (48MP main + 12MP ultra-wide + 12MP telephoto), 256GB storage, and all-day battery life.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Extra-thick 6mm eco-friendly yoga mat with alignment lines for proper positioning. Double-sided non-slip surfaces, excellent cushioning for joints, and includes carrying strap. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and floor exercises.

name: Desk Lamp
description: Modern LED desk lamp with 5 color modes and 7 brightness levels. Features flexible gooseneck, touch controls, USB charging port, and auto-off timer. Memory function saves your preferred settings.

name: Water Bottle
description: Vacuum-insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. Leak-proof lid, wide mouth for easy cleaning, and powder-coated exterior for better grip.

name: Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and high-resolution audio. Features multi-device connectivity, touch controls, and foldable design for easy transport.

name: Plant Pot
description: Minimalist ceramic plant pot with drainage hole and bamboo saucer. Perfect for indoor plants, features glazed interior to prevent water seepage and matte exterior finish. Available in multiple sizes.

name: Protein Powder
description: Premium whey protein isolate with 25g protein per serving, enhanced with BCAAs and digestive enzymes. Low in sugar and carbs, mixes instantly, and available in multiple natural flavors.

name: Book Stand
description: Adjustable bamboo book stand with 6 height levels and 3 reading angles. Perfect for cookbooks, textbooks, and tablets. Folds flat for easy storage and features page holder clips.

name: Smart Watch
description: Advanced fitness smartwatch with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and blood oxygen measurement. Features 14-day battery life, 20+ sport modes, and smartphone notifications.

name: Cutting Board
description: Premium end-grain bamboo cutting board with juice grooves and handles. Naturally antimicrobial, knife-friendly surface with reversible design. Pre-seasoned with food-grade mineral oil.

name: Sunglasses
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV400 protection and scratch-resistant lenses. Lightweight yet durable frame made from recycled materials. Includes protective case and microfiber cleaning cloth.
